Spells.Name: Protego
Spells.Text: You raise your wand quickly, whispering "Protego" to block the incoming spell.

Spells.Name: Stupefy
Spells.Text: You aim at your opponent and shout "Stupefy!", stunning it and launching it backwards.

Spells.Name: Expelliarmus
Spells.Text: With a sharp flick, you cast "Expelliarmus!" and the opponent's wand flew from their hand.
